Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Joseph P. Alenghat "JPA"
Reviews.Content: Very good camera and zoom lens! Good close ups and far shots. Excellent autofocus and low vibration. Battery is also good.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera for the starter.
Reviews.Author: DCA
Reviews.Content: This is by no means a professional camera. It will do any and all that an amateur would like to do but it is not going to replace a studio camera. I love this camera, got one after using a friends to shoot a couple of events. I can easily see myself using this to do family pics or event pics but don't start marketing yourself as a pro with this one. It has an excellent battery life and durability. You will want to play with your own settings instead of the auto features, it gets it wrong more often than naught.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera with Guide that makes picture taking easy
Reviews.Author: Richard Holley JR
Reviews.Content: I love this Nikon camera.  It takes great pictures and is user friendly.  When in doubt, the Guide Mode takes care of you. Performs as well or better than my professional cameras and takes excellent pictures in Auto. Nikon lenses are excellent matches to this high quality 24.2 MP Camera. I love the weight and how it fits in my hand.  Nikon is the only Camera I buy.

Reviews.Title: returned for the d5200
Reviews.Author: Rob
Reviews.Content: returned the d3200 for the d5200 and was worth the extra money, the 5200 is all around better, reacts faster. seemed that the 3200 would randomly make you wait a second to take a pic when trying to take pictures fast, where as the 5200 is much more responsive and doesn't miss a pic.

Reviews.Title: Good semiprofressional camera
Reviews.Author: Dianne C Dixon
Reviews.Content: I like the functionality of this camera as it is easy to operate but it is not as I expected it to be.  I am used to a more professional camera and this one you are limited to what all you can do.. It is overall a good camera and well worth the price .  It has features that guide you through the steps of photographing in certain situations , therefore a camera for anyone that wants a good point and shoot camera.

Reviews.Title: Easy to use and very practical
Reviews.Author: Sidnei de Moraes Junior
Reviews.Content: I found it very good, easy to use and very practical. It met my expectations completely. Recommend to all!Tks

Reviews.Title: Love It !!
Reviews.Author: Jack Strobel
Reviews.Content: Just getting started with it but so far very easy to use and the pictures are fantastic! shoots great 1080i video's.

Reviews.Title: did not recived all the itens
Reviews.Author: O. gomes "OG"
Reviews.Content: I did not recived one of the the itens that I bought. the offer are 1 camera and 2 lenses , but I recived only the camer and 1 lenses

Reviews.Title: My favorite camera
Reviews.Author: IK
Reviews.Content: upgrading from a point and shoot Panasonic Lumix, and I am thoroughly impressed, then again it's Nikon, you can't go wrong and I didn't

ProductInfo.Features:
Wi-Fi Connectivity with adapter (not included)
24.2 MP DX-format CMOS sensor
EXPEED III Image Processing
Wide ISO sensitivity range - One-touch Full HD 1080p movie recording
Kit Includes 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Zoom Lens and 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Zoom Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR and 55-300mm f/4.5-5.6G ED VR AF-S DX NIKKOR Zoom Lenses
